title.rendered: 6 best building and construction WordPress themes

content.rendered:
This second collection is useful for corporate websites, building and construction businesses. In general, the following themes can be used by building and construction, architectural and renovation companies, contractors, plumbers and carpenters.
As usual, all the themes have been chosen based on their aesthetics, features, reliability of authors and rates. I hope that you enjoy them.

1 – BuildPress – Construction Business WP Theme


BuildPress is one of the most bought WordPress themes for the websites of construction businesses. It has more than 243 5-star ratings, and for good reason. BuildPress takes care of details, both in code and in design/layout, and provides you all you need for your construction website. It has a lot of features, such as page builder, shortcodes, one-click demo install, WordPress customizer compatibility.

2 – Construction – WP Construction, Building Business


This is another great theme in this niche. Construction is a responsive WordPress theme, which includes plenty of customisation options, allowing you to change the visual style of any element without touching a single line of code. Construction is translation-ready and includes many premium plugins, which will allow you to save $71 – more than the price of the theme itself!

3 – BestBuild | Construction & Building WP Theme


BestBuild is the most recent theme, the winner of the ThemeForest contest “Best Business Services Theme”. One of the strengths of this theme is support service, always available to help their customers. BestBuild also includes a premium plugin – Bakery Visual Composer, which will allow you to create your pages without effort.

4 – Darna – Building & Construction WordPress Theme


Darna is another good theme for construction and building websites. It provides five prebuilt homepages and a one-click install demo. It is WPML-compatible and RTL-ready. Also, this theme includes Bakery Visual Composer and Slider Revolution – the plugins that save your time and money. Darna is constantly updated and has a dedicated support team, which will help you with any issue.

5 – Plumbing – Repair, Building & Construction Theme


Plumbing is a mobile-friendly WordPress theme designed for such professions as handyman, plumber, carpenter, repair and maintenance worker. One of the features of Plumbing is a table for online appointments, very useful for such jobs. This theme is translation-ready and has an options panel, which makes it flexible and easy to customize.

6 – Cleanco – Cleaning Company WordPress Theme


Cleanco is a beautiful and ultra-flexible WordPress theme, designed for cleaning, maid service, maintenance and general service companies. It contains all you need for building your website without touching the code. It has a powerful and user-friendly options panel and a one-click demo install. Cleanco is also highly suitable for other company and corporate categories. It is also WooCommerce compatible.
